name: Blind Fate - A winter's Tale
description:
Blind Fate - A winter's tale was made for the Winter Visual Novel Jam 2022!

The first Act of a Vivienne, a successful women with not enough time for everyone.

Will she relentlessy persuit her carrer? Glued to ther phone, watching every move of the outside world.

Or will she use her vacation to spend time with her kids and make a good Winter memory?

Programming: LotK

Music: Bismii

Writing: Aelinar

Character Sprites: miencha
